item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18730)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra in Washington post
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra in Washington post

President Biden froze deportations for 100 days, but a federal judge quickly blocked that order, creating a dilemma for those still in sanctuary.

washingtonpost.com

They moved into churches to avoid deportation. Now theyâ€™re asking: Is it safe to leave?

item.title: Citizen for immigrants Now
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Citizen for immigrants Now

Phan Q.C. is with Jeanette Vizguerra and Alexis Hernandez.

Denver immigrant leaders and allies standing with the rest of the state to tell President Biden that we demand a pathway to citizenship for ALL! No criminalization, No carve outs, No more deportations! #ImmigrationReformNow

Sanctuary4All Colorado Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Today weâ€™re asking the Biden administration to provide a path...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Today weâ€™re asking the Biden administration to provide a path to citizenship for all 11 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. Weâ€™re counting on @johnhickenlooper and @senatorbennet to be leaders for immigration reform for all. Join us by calling them at 202-952-2564 and demanding a path to citizenship without restrictions.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We are coming up on a year of solidarity meals, a program that...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We are coming up on a year of solidarity meals, a program that Jeanette created to help immigrants effectively dedicate funds to their cases through a sustainable mutual aid program. We are grateful to bring the community together through everyone's favorite way: food. Drop by to pickup some tortitas this weekend; we hope to continue to be your saturday treat!
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Solitary meals
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Solitary meals

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Jeanette is selling tortitas this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Jeanette Vizguerra has been fighting for the most vulnerable f...or more than two decades and has been fighting her own deportation process for more than 12 years while helping others in the same situation, she has been a refugee for the second time in sanctuary for more than 2 years to continue fighting her case and continuing with her family with the pandemic and empty churches she does not have enough help and selling food helps her have resources for her legal and living costs help her continue her fight for herself and others, even with the administration Baiden's laws have not changed enough for him to regain his freedom and his fight will continue to support

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas rojas this weekend to raise money to...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas this weekend to raise money to pay for her residency. Theyâ€™re $15 per plate. Pickup is available in Denver and Boulder. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to raise money for her residency application. She moved to the US with her mother as a child and is a DACA recipient, which has allowed her to pursue education, work, and have more stability with her family. But DACA doesnâ€™t provide a pathway to citizenship, and itâ€™s protection, by nature, is temporary. Securing her residency will give Tania and her family more stability. You can support her in that process by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We're a little over 60 emails away from our goal -- please...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We're a little over 60 emails away from our goal -- please help us show the house judiciary committee that Coloradans across the state agree: no one should face detention and deportation without access to a lawyer: bit.ly/VoteYesOnHB21-1194

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to raise money for her residency application. She moved to the US with her mother as a child and is a DACA recipient, which has allowed her to pursue education, work, and have more stability with her family. But DACA doesnâ€™t provide a pathway to citizenship, and itâ€™s protection, by nature, is temporary. Securing her residency will give Tania and her family more stability. You can support her in that process by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

item.title: Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the money raised will go toward our emergency fund in case someone is detained or in immediate need of a lawyer. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Photo by @traeben1717, who is working alongside several folks to create a documentary about the #SolidarityMeals program.
Director: Tyler Borkowski @little_bork_man
Producer: Chloe Halvorson @uunga.bunga...
Director of Photography: Trae Beneck @traeben1717
Lead Journalist: Karen Manley @karennmanley
Translator: Luis Castro Ortega

item.title: Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant families in these hard times now that their legal costs remain and to help them provide for some things such as food or any other indispensable necessities now that some have lost their jobs because of COVID-19. Please donate what you can Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All. Por favor ayuda o apoya a familias immigrantes ya que sus costos legales en sus procesos de deportaciÃ³n continÃºan y para apoyar con algunas cosas indispensables como comida o algunos gastos de utilidades ya que con este problema del COVID-19 algunos perdieron su empleo o los descansaron por tiempo indefinido Dona a Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All
